data.title: Complete Financial Data Mastery
data.text:
Security Mastering is Just the Start. Discover All We Can Do

GoldenSource’s expertise in security mastering is just the beginning. We offer a comprehensive suite of data management solutions tailored for financial services practitioners.

Every GoldenSource solution is engineered to follow one core principle: to enable best-in-class data analytics that fuel real business growth.

It’s the reason our solutions are trusted by the world’s most innovative investment firms and the systemically important banks.

Our range of data management solutions deliver the gold standard of data to provide clarity about the relationships between legal entities, issuers, counterparties, customers, securities, products, and transactions… and much more.

Take a look below at some of the many data management solutions we provide to our clients on the buy side and on the sell side. But it’s just a small sample. To learn more about everything we do, book a session with one of our data management experts today.

For the Buy Side.

Portfolio Managers and Owners rely on GoldenSource to gain greater, more reliable market and industry insights. Our ability to provide a single, non-duplicative, clean, gold copy of investment data gives you the most current, accurate view of the market possible.

OUR PRODUCT PORTFOLIO

Cloud-Ready Data Warehousing. Now.

The GOLDENSOURCE Data Warehouse Solution or our native Snowflake application, GoldenSource OMNI provides an API purpose-built for complete, singular visibility by unifying multiple sources of investment data. There is no faster way to build a data warehouse in the cloud.

The Best Pricing Data. Always.

GOLDENSOURCE PRICE MASTER provides a comprehensive pricing infrastructure that runs from vendor and source data, to quality assurance and mastering of prices and related securities reference data, to end user-ready valuation.

Client, Account and Product Data Management. Ready-to-view.

GOLDENSOURCE CAP DATA MASTER enables deep insights by interlinking client, account and product data, removing operational hurdles by breaking down proprietary siloes to manage and analyze the data with one unified visualization.

For the Sell Side.

Investment Managers, Analysts, and Traders rely on GoldenSource to provide critical financial data that enables a 360-degree understanding of their business, risks and operational challenges in a constantly evolving market environment.

OUR PRODUCT PORTFOLIO

The Best Market Data and Insight. All in One Place.

GOLDENSOURCE MDS provides access to comprehensive market data that enables you to assess and verify market value and risk – intra-day and EOD, through an easy-to-navigate user interface that quickly shows all the relevant data you need on demand.

Cloud-Ready Data Warehousing. Now.

GOLDENSOURCE OMNI is our API purpose-built for complete, singular visibility by unifying multiple sources of financial data. There is no faster way to build a data warehouse in the cloud.

A Clear View of Your Entity Data. Centralized.

GOLDENSOURCE ENTITY MASTER gives you a clear window into corporate entities, simplifying the complexities of entity-to-entity relationships by managing instrument, counterparty and issuer data all on a single platform.

An Extension of Your IT Infrastructure. Any time.

GOLDENSOURCE ONDEMAND provides hosted and managed services to deliver accessible, secure, streamlined Enterprise Data Management for firms looking to reduce costs, enhance operations and focus on core business competencies.

All the ESG Data You Need. All of it.

GOLDENSOURCE ESG IMPACT PLUS is the only data management solution that enables you to fully manage your ESG data from ingestion to consumption with unrivalled transparency, insight, and accuracy.
